message.content: Read this repo. I wanna implement a feature that is a multi dimensional AI agent. think of it as an agent that instead of having just one conversation flow, can have multiple ones at the same time? Its easier to implement this here or to start it from scratch?

alright. lets plan this. - this is a cloned version of the repo, I guess the best approach to start would be a fork, right? - We'll use ultracontext sdk for the context engineering (docs under ../website/docs, sdks/api under ../ultracontext-node and ../ultracontext-python) - Real time streaming would be great
